Enumerations | Functions | Variables
RS9116 SDIO WiFi Driver
devices

Detailed Description

Purpose: This module provides a hardware abstraction layer for the RS9116 WiFi module using SDIO interface. It enables wireless connectivity, command processing, and power management for embedded applications requiring WiFi capabilities. The driver supports multiple operation modes, data transfers, and features for optimal wireless performance.

Key Features

  1. SDIO Interface: High-speed data transfer support.
  2. WiFi Modes: Support for multiple WiFi operating modes.
  3. Power Management: Advanced power saving features.
  4. Buffer Management: Efficient data buffering and transfer.
  5. Command Processing: Robust command interface handling.

Functionality

  • Initialize and configure RS9116 module
  • Handle SDIO data transfers
  • Manage WiFi operations and modes
  • Control power states and sleep modes
  • Process command and response packets

Usage

  1. Initialize module with am_devices_sdio_rs9116_init()
  2. Configure WiFi parameters
  3. Perform data transfers using provided APIs
  4. Manage power states as needed

Configuration

  • Set up SDIO interface parameters
  • Configure WiFi operation mode
  • Set power management options
  • Define buffer configurations
